mahānipāta： mahānipāta（pu）
မဟာနိပါတ（ပု）
[mahanta+nipāta]
[မဟန္တ+နိပါတ]

Mahānipāta：1．Mahānipāta．The twenty second section of the Jātakatthakathā．J．vi．1 593．

2．Mahānipāta． The last section of the Theragāthā and the Therīgāthā．The former contains the verses attributed those attributed to Vangīsa and the latter to Sumedhā．

mahānipāta：မဟာနိပါတ（ပု）
[မဟန္တ+နိပါတ]
မဟာနိပါတ်။
